title: Peeter Gijsels
summary: Peeter Gijsels or Pieter Gijsels (1621, Antwerp – 1690, Antwerp), was a Flemish Baroque painter.  He is known for his landscapes, architectural compositions and still lifes.  His landscapes in the style of Jan Brueghel the Elder were very sought after in his time.  He is also regarded as a genre painter as he painted village scenes of village markets and kermises.
